mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RF_ORDER_TBL(ord_code, raki_id, ord_name, ord_zipcode, ord_addr_basic, ord_addr_detail, ord_tel, ord_price, ORD_REGDATE, ORD_STATUS, PAYMENT_STATUS) VALUES (#{ord_code},#{raki_id},#{ord_name},#{ord_zipcode},#{ord_addr_basic},#{ord_addr_detail},#{ord_tel},#{ord_price},SYSDATE,#{ord_status},#{payment_status})

INSERT INTO ORDETAIL_TBL(ord_code, pro_num, dt_amount, dt_price) SELECT #{ord_code}, c.pro_num, c.rfcart_amount, p.pro_price FROM RF_CART_TBL c inner join PRODUCT_TBL p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num WHERE raki_id = #{raki_id}
mapper.select: SELECT pro_up_folder, pro_img, pro_price, #{rfcart_amount} as rfcart_amount, pro_price * #{rfcart_amount} as pro_discount, #{raki_id} as raki_id, pro_num, pro_name FROM PRODUCT_TBL WHERE pro_num = #{pro_num}
